[05:57:13] <Flannel> ogge: No need to remove, just install the next one overtop.  8.04 will work, yeah.  You'll want the alternate CD if you're going to use fluxbox.
you can technically apt-get from the desktop CD, it just only has a handful of packages
the desktop CD is an image (the live image) which gets copied to your harddrive.  The alternate CD actually contains packages.
And there are a few packages (not included in the image) that people may need to connect to the internet, etc (build-essential as an example)
debian provides their entire repos on CDs
